function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Uncertainty in the value of the upper-room UV susceptibility constant for SARS-CoV-2","Impact":"Inaccurate assessment of the disinfection potential of upper-room UVGI for SARS-CoV-2","Mitigation":"Conduct further experimental work to determine the true value of the upper-room UV susceptibility constant for SARS-CoV-2","Technologies":"Experimental testing, data analysis","People":"Researchers, scientists, public health officials","Owner":"Research institutions, laboratories"},{"Description":"Assumption of well-mixed room air may not reflect real-world conditions","Impact":"Inaccurate assessment of the performance of upper-room UVGI in real-world applications","Mitigation":"Use computational fluid dynamics (CFD) to assess the limitations of the technology with respect to room air convection currents","Technologies":"Computational fluid dynamics (CFD)","People":"Researchers, scientists, public health officials","Owner":"Research institutions, laboratories"},{"Description":"Limitations of the model used in assessing upper-room UVGI effectiveness","Impact":"Inability to evaluate the performance of upper-room UVGI in scenarios where aerosol particles decouple from the air stream or remain suspended in the breath zone","Mitigation":"Conduct future studies using computational fluid dynamics (CFD) to assess the limitations of the technology with respect to larger aerosol particles","Technologies":"Computational fluid dynamics (CFD)","People":"Researchers, scientists, public health officials","Owner":"Research institutions, laboratories"}]}
